rows.label: tev900201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey! How are you? Here to invite me
to join you on a mission, perchance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm ready to go whenever, really.
There's still so much left of Mira
to explore![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900201_SELS0040
rows.name: Add Neil to your team.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Yes, good! The right answer!
Already looking forward to it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900201_SEL0070
rows.name: Decline Neil's request for now.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0080
rows.name:
What...? You'd really...turn me down?
...Nah, I'm just messing with youâ€”
we can hang out some other time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0090
rows.name:
I've been able to make some human
friends lately, and I'm starting to really
feel accepted here in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0100
rows.name:
And you made it possible. I'll never forget
the kindness that you showed me.
...So, how about that adventure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900201_SEL0120
rows.name: Add Neil to your team.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0130
rows.name:
Good, good!
You won't regret it, I promise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900201_SEL0150
rows.name: Decline Neil's request for now.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0160
rows.name:
Well, watch yourself out there!
And whatever you need, I hope you get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0170
rows.name:
Elma's told me everything. You have my
full, unreserved, undying support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0180
rows.name:
This is not just a problem for humans.
I want to do all that's in my power to
help you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0190
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev900201_SEL0200
rows.name: Add Neil to your team.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0210
rows.name:
Yeah, okay.
We'll figure this out together, you'll see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900201_JNK0220
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev900201_SEL0230
rows.name: Decline Neil's request for now.

rows.label: tev900201_MSG0240
rows.name:
When faced with the unknown, it pays to
think things through with a clear head.
...Please, look after yourself.[ST:wait ]
